legendary_barb_001.desc: Whenever you deal direct damage while {c_important}Berserking{/c}, inflict {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} of the base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_001.name: of Berserk Ripping

legendary_barb_002.desc: {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} damaging enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds. While standing in Earthquakes, you deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
legendary_barb_002.name: Earthquake

legendary_barb_003.desc: Stunning a Bleeding enemy deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of their total Bleeding amount to them as Physical damage.
legendary_barb_003.name: Skullbreaker's

legendary_barb_004.desc:
Your {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skills have an additional Charge.

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to Stun them for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_004.name: Weapon Master's

legendary_barb_005.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 / Affix."Static Value 0" |1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for each Nearby Bleeding enemy up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} maximum.
legendary_barb_005.name: Iron Blood

legendary_barb_006.desc: Gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds when you swap to this weapon.
legendary_barb_006.name: Battle-Mad

legendary_barb_007.desc: Your {c_important}Shout{/c} skills generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} Fury per second while active.
legendary_barb_007.name: of Echoing Fury

legendary_barb_009.desc: Increase {c_important}Frenzy's{/c} maximum stacks by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.Â  While you have maximum {c_important}Frenzy{/c}, your other Skills gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.
legendary_barb_009.name: Frenzied

legendary_barb_010.desc: Reduces the Cooldown of {c_important}Leap{/c} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds per enemy hit, up to a max of {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_010.name: of Giant Strides

legendary_barb_011.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to extend the duration of {c_important}Berserking{/c} by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} second. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.
legendary_barb_011.name: Relentless Berserker's

legendary_barb_013.desc: Killing an enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill refunds {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} of its base Fury cost. Can only happen once per Skill cast.
legendary_barb_013.name: of Unrelenting Fury

legendary_barb_014.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging enemies with {c_important}Leap{/c}, {c_important}Upheaval{/c}, or {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill. Can only happen once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_014.name: of Ancestral Echoes

legendary_barb_015.desc: Skills using this weapon deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1*100|1%|]{/c} increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury every second.
legendary_barb_015.name: Crane Tribe

legendary_barb_017.desc: Each point of Fury generated while at maximum Fury grants {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1|1|]{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
legendary_barb_017.name: of Numbing Wrath

legendary_barb_018.desc: Enemies damaged by {c_important}Kick{/c} or {c_important}Charge{/c} will explode if they are killed within the next {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to surrounding enemies.
legendary_barb_018.name: Brawler's

legendary_barb_019.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} leaves behind {c_important}Dust Devils{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to surrounding enemies.
legendary_barb_019.name: Dust Devil's

legendary_barb_020.desc: After spending {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury, your next {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skill deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
legendary_barb_020.name: of Encroaching Wrath

legendary_barb_021.desc: Gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Fury Generation while all damage bonuses from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} are active.
legendary_barb_021.name: of the Relentless Armsmaster

legendary_barb_022.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury per second while {c_important}Berserking{/c}.
legendary_barb_022.name: of Berserk Fury

legendary_barb_025.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind's{/c} Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for each second it is channeled, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
legendary_barb_025.name: of the Dire Whirlwind

legendary_barb_026.desc: {c_important}Leap{/c} creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds. While standing in {c_important}Earthquakes{/c}, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_barb_026.name: of Bul-Kathos

legendary_barb_027.desc: Casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} twice within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds creates a {c_important}Dust Devil{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to enemies behind the target.
legendary_barb_027.name: Windlasher

legendary_barb_040.desc: Each time a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next {c_important}Charge{/c} or {c_important}Leap{/c} deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
legendary_barb_040.name: Veteran Brawler's

legendary_barb_041.desc: {c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c} quakes outwards, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage to enemies.
legendary_barb_041.name: of Ancestral Force

legendary_barb_055.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c} whenever you deal direct damage while {c_important}Berserking{/c}.
legendary_barb_055.name: Steadfast Berserker's

legendary_barb_057.desc: Whenever you cast a {c_important}Shout{/c} Skill, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds per Nearby enemy, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_057.name: Bold Chieftain's

legendary_barb_100.desc: Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Kick{/c} or {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} resets {c_important}Leap's{/c} Cooldown.
legendary_barb_100.name: of Perpetual Stomping

legendary_barb_101.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your {c_important}non-Ultimate{/c} Skills by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} seconds when you inflict Bleeding on Elites.
legendary_barb_101.name: of Quickening Pulse

legendary_barb_102.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Direct damage against Bleeding enemies has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to Stun them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_102.name: of Anemia

legendary_barb_103.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} You have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury when {c_important}Rend{/c} deals direct damage to at least one Bleeding enemy.
legendary_barb_103.name: Slaking

legendary_barb_104.desc: After swapping weapons {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times, gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_104.name: Windstriker's

legendary_barb_105.desc: After swapping weapons {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times, gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
legendary_barb_105.name: of Tempering Blows

legendary_barb_106.desc: Gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit chance while all damage bonuses from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} are active.
legendary_barb_106.name: Luckbringer

legendary_barb_107.desc: Killing an enemy while {c_important}Berserking{/c} has a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Cooldown Reduction to your {c_important}Brawling{/c} Skills for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_barb_107.name: Bear Clan Berserker's

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_001.desc: Bleeding enemies you kill explode, dealing {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of their max life to nearby enemies.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_002.desc: Enemies that have been affected by your Bleeding for {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} or more seconds take {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage from you.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_003.desc: Bleeding you inflict deals damage {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} faster.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_004.desc: Killing a Bleeding target has {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_005.desc: Increases the power of your {c_important}Shout{/c} skills by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_006.desc: {c_important}Shout{/c} skills fortify you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your maximum life.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_007.desc: When you are under any {c_important}Shout{/c} effect, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage and take {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} less damage.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_008.desc: While Berserk, you take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your maximum life as Bleed damage per second, but deal {c_number}x[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_009.desc: While {c_important}Berserking{/c}, critical strikes increase your attack speed by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[{SF_2}]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_010.desc: While Berserk, your {c_important}Defensive{/c} skills recharge {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} faster.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_011.desc: For every {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} Fury you spend, gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([{SF_1} * PlayerHealthMax()]){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_012.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less damage from all sources, but can no longer dodge attacks.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_013.desc: While standing still, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} extra damage reduction, and have {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} reduced CC duration.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_014.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Two-Handed Slashing Weapon attacks have up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_015.desc: {c_important}Overpowers{/c} with your Two-Handed Bludgeoning Weapon Stun enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} |4second:seconds; and grant you {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([{SF_1} * PlayerHealthMax()]){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c_important}.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_016.desc: Damaging enemies with One-Handed Weapons increases your damage by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}. This can only happen once per Skill cast, or twice per second while channeling {c_important}Whirlwind{/c}.

Paragon_Barb_Legendary_017.desc: Swapping weapons reduces your active, non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} skill cooldowns by {c_number}[{SF_0|2|}]{/c} seconds.

1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill creates a {c_important}Dust Devil{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to enemies behind the target.
1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. He deserved to see ten thousand more suns. Our blood-brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day."
- Sorrowsong for Ramaladni
1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus

2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional chains. Enemies hit by {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} are Slowed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength."
- Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.name: Ancients' Oath

2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Upheaval{/c} ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.name: Hellhammer

2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.desc: {c_important}Death Blow{/c} creates a shockwave, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset {c_important}Death Blow's{/c} Cooldown.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that reside in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.name: Overkill

2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} creates a blood pool that inflicts {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage.
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.flavor:
"We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on."
- Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.name: Fields of Crimson

Boots_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After gaining the final damage bonus from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c}, you automatically cast {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} and gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury. This cannot happen more than once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home."
- A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.name: 100,000 Steps

Chest_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While {c_important}Berserking{/c}, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.
Chest_Unique_Barb_002.flavor: The city of Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat, was reduced to rubble when the Worldstone was destroyed. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.
Chest_Unique_Barb_002.name: Rage of Harrogath

Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} explodes after it ends, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the total base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The brutish, almost simplistic construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips

Ring_Unique_Barb_001.desc: Each point of Fury you generate while at max Fury grants your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1  * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
Ring_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The change that overtook my brother in the heat of battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear."
- Captain Davinus
Ring_Unique_Barb_001.name: Battle Trance

TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2h.desc: (PH) Consecutive Hammer of the Ancients increase the next cast's damage by {c_number}{Affix_Value_1}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_1}*2}% and its radius by {c_number}{Affix_Value_2}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_2}*2}%.
TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2h.name: of Hammering

legendary_druid_002.desc: After killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c}, your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill generates {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more Spirit and deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.

legendary_druid_012.desc: Gain {c_important}Stealth{/c} for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds when killing enemies with {c_important}Shred{/c}. Breaking {c_important}Stealth{/c} with an attack grants Ambush which guarantees Critical Strikes for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.

legendary_druid_013.desc: {c_important}Hurricane{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} each second while active.

legendary_druid_018.desc: Damage from {c_important}Earth{/c} skills Slow enemies hit by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

legendary_druid_026.desc: The duration of {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. legendary_druid_057.desc: Your {c_important}Earth skills{/c} are now also {c_important}Werebear skills{/c} and {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c}.

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Storm skills{/c} have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit.

legendary_druid_066.desc: {c_important}Pulverize{/c} is now also an {c_important}Earth{/c} skill. After casting {c_important}Pulverize{/c}, tectonic spikes continue to deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

legendary_druid_071.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} skills deal up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|] {/c} increased damage based on your percent {c_important}Fortified Health{/c}.

legendary_druid_074.desc: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage to targets in the path.

legendary_druid_104.desc: The duration of {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} for the duration.

legendary_druid_106.desc: Your {c_important}Companions{/c} gain the bonuses from {c_important}Bestial Rampage{/c}.

legendary_druid_108.desc: When you have {c_important}Fortified{/c} Life your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.

Enemies that are already {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} have its duration extended by {c_number}[{SF_1}|1|]{/c} seconds instead.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_003.desc: {c_important}Storm{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike damage against {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} or {c_important}Immobilized{/c} targets.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_008.desc: (REDESIGN){c_important}Werebear{/c} skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Overpower{/c} and {c_important}Knockdown{/c} for {c_number}[SF_2|1|]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_009.desc: While in Werebear form, you apply {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} bonus {c_important}Fortify{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_010.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills restore {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Spirit.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_011.desc: Your {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against poisoned targets.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_012.desc: While there are {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} or more poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_013.desc: After shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_014.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} skill increases the critical strike chance of your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skill by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.

Casting an {c_important{Earth{/c} skill increases the critical strike damage of your next {c_important}Werebear{/c} skill by {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_015.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Overpower{/c} targets that are {c_important}Vulnerable{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_016.desc: Your {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage against enemies affected by your {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_017.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to entangle the target with vines, Immobilizing them for {c_number}[{SF_1}]{/c} seconds and poisoning them for {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of the base damage dealt over {c_number}[SF_3]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_018.desc: After spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Spirit, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Druid_Passive_Deer_04.desc: Reduce the duration of incoming crowd control effects by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.

Druid_Passive_Snake_01.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Earth{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to Stun enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds. If the target is already stunned and is not a boss, they {c_important}Overpower{/c} the target instead.

Druid_Passive_Snake_02.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing Lightning damage has up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to cause the target to emit a static discharge, dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE}{/c} damage to surrounding enemies.

Druid_Passive_Snake_03.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} skills heal you for {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} of your maximum Life.

Druid_Passive_Snake_04.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to reduce the cooldown of your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} skill by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.
Druid_Passive_Snake_04.name: Calm Before the Storm

Druid_Passive_Wolf_01.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to reset the cooldown of your {c_important}Companion{/c} skills.
Druid_Passive_Wolf_01.name: Packleader

Druid_Passive_Wolf_02.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing damage has up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to restore {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Spirit.

Druid_Passive_Wolf_04.desc: Extend the duration of {c_important}Ultimate{/c} skills by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c}.

1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} now shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. Dire Werewolf gains {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} movement speed instead of damage reduction and a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*2|%|]{/c} Spirit cost reduction bonus. In addition, kills heal you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your maximum Life.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The anticipation of the upcoming event can drive some werewolves into a fever from which they never recover.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.name: Waxing Gibbous

1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Dancing Bolts{/c} that seek enemies in the area dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." 
â Airidah
1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.name: Tempest Song

2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Claw{/c} is now a {c_important}Storm{/c} skill and also casts {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} at {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-GÃ©ar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery, and she remains impartial in all conflicts. Approach her with deference, and she may grant you her counsel."
- Airidah, to Donan
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.name: Greatstaff of the Crone

Chest_Unique_Druid_002.desc: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} to all {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.flavor:
"He was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." 
â Tale of the Mad Nobleman
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.name: Mad Wolf's Glee

Chest_Unique_Druid_003.desc: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} to all {c_important}Werebear{/c} skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.flavor: When the Days of Ash fell upon Scosglen, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect TÃºr DÃºlra from Astaroth's flames.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.name: Insatiable Fury

Pants_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf Companions{/c} are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the {c_important}Storm Howl{/c} ability.
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply."
- Vasily, to Bul-Kathos
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.name: Storm's Companion

Ring_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Gain {c_number}1{/c} additional companion. In addition, your {c_important}Companion Skills{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage.
Ring_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"A sapling from the Great Oak, left to grow at the seaward statue of the Druid's Patriarch, will on rare occasions be found twisted back upon itself, suffused with natural magic."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Ring_Unique_Druid_001.name: Vasily's Prayer

Ring_Unique_Druid_003.desc:
Gain a bonus when you kill with a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill:

{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werewolf:{/c} Your next non-ultimate {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill costs no resource and has no cooldown.
{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werebear:{/c} Your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skill will heal you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} when damage is first dealt.
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.flavor:
"By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-GÃ©ar! For Scosglen!"
- Nafain, during the Days of Ash
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.name: Hunter's Zenith

legendary_generic_006.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life healed.
legendary_generic_006.name: Starlight

legendary_generic_009.desc: {c_important}Basic{/c} skills grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} damage reduction for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_generic_009.name: of Might

legendary_generic_011.desc: Every {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds, gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} absorbing up to {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage.

legendary_generic_014.desc: Deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased damage for each second you stand still, up to {c_number}x[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.

legendary_generic_016.desc: Critical Strikes grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second. The duration can be extended.

legendary_generic_021.desc: Restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.

legendary_generic_023.desc: Each consecutive {c_important}Core{/c} Skill cast reduces the resource cost of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.

legendary_generic_027.desc: Deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage while you have a {c_important}Barrier{/c} active.

legendary_generic_065.name: of the Patient Sage

legendary_generic_067.desc: Enemies hit with {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_generic_067.name: of the Expectant

legendary_generic_100.desc: You may move freely through enemies while below {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} total Life.
legendary_generic_100.name: Ghostwalker

legendary_generic_102.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Strike:{/c} When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
legendary_generic_102.name: of Shared Misery

legendary_generic_103.desc: Taking {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your total Life in damage while Stunned, Frozen or Immobilized will clear the effect.
legendary_generic_103.name: Eluding

legendary_generic_104.desc: When you take damage from a damage over time effect, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} resource.
legendary_generic_104.name: Assimilation

legendary_generic_106.desc: Thorns damage dealt has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal damage to all enemies around you.
legendary_generic_106.name: Needleflare

legendary_generic_107.desc: While you have a {c_important}Barrier{/c} active, there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to ignore incoming direct damage from Distant enemies.
legendary_generic_107.name: of the Deflecting Barrier

legendary_generic_108.desc: Effects that heal you beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life grant you a {c_important}Barrier{/c} up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_generic_108.name: Restorative

legendary_generic_109.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Crit_Percent_Bonus_Vs_CC_Target_Any*100|%|]{/c} against Crowd Controlled enemies.
legendary_generic_109.name: Smiting

ParagonGlyph_001.desc: Skills you do not directly cast deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_001.name: Enchant

ParagonGlyph_002.desc: After spending 50 Mana, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage and gain {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} increased Mana regeneration for [SF_3] seconds.
ParagonGlyph_002.name: Release

ParagonGlyph_003.desc: Fire, Cold, and Lightning damage individually increase all of the target's damage taken by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[SF_1]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_003.name: Elements

ParagonGlyph_006.desc: Picking up {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} grants you {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_006.name: Static

ParagonGlyph_007.desc: Burning damage has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage.
ParagonGlyph_007.name: Cremator

ParagonGlyph_008.desc: Every {c_important}Pyromancy{/c} skill you cast or every second you channel {c_important}Incinerate{/c} increases your Fire damage by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0} * {SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[{SF_2}]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_008.name: Pyromaniac

ParagonGlyph_009.desc: Non-player enemies that hit you are {c_important}Chilled{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c}.
ParagonGlyph_009.name: Glacier

ParagonGlyph_010.desc: You gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} resistance to all elements.
ParagonGlyph_010.name: Ward

ParagonGlyph_012.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage while you have an active {c_important}Barrier{/c}.
ParagonGlyph_012.name: Protector

ParagonGlyph_013.desc: While {c_important}Stationary{/c}, you gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([{SF_0} * PlayerHealthMax()]){/c}.
ParagonGlyph_013.name: Poise

ParagonGlyph_014.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage from Close enemies.
ParagonGlyph_014.name: Turf

ParagonGlyph_015.desc: Burning effects last {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} longer but deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
ParagonGlyph_015.name: Flamefeeder

ParagonGlyph_016.desc: When an enemy is damaged by you, they become {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} seconds. This cannot happen more than once every {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds per enemy.
ParagonGlyph_016.name: Exploit

ParagonGlyph_017.desc: You deal up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Cold damage to targets the more {c_important}Chilled{/c} they are.
ParagonGlyph_017.name: Frigid

ParagonGlyph_018.desc: Targets struck with Lightning damage take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.
ParagonGlyph_018.name: Dynamo

ParagonGlyph_019.desc: Critical strikes increase all damage the target takes by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.
ParagonGlyph_019.name: Destruction

ParagonGlyph_020.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to slowed or {c_important}Chilled{/c} targets or, instead, {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to stunned or {c_important}Frozen{/c} targets.
ParagonGlyph_020.name: Control

ParagonGlyph_021.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage while dual wielding weapons.
ParagonGlyph_021.name: Ambidextrous

ParagonGlyph_022.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage while wielding 2-handed weapons.
ParagonGlyph_022.name: Might

ParagonGlyph_023.name: Cleaver

ParagonGlyph_024.desc: While wielding a sword, you gain {c_number}[SF_0]{/c} Fury when you kill an enemy.

ParagonGlyph_025.desc: While wielding a mace, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased {c_important}Overpower{/c} damage.
ParagonGlyph_025.name: Crusher

ParagonGlyph_026.desc: While wielding a polearm, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Healthy{/c} or {c_important}Injured{/c} targets.
ParagonGlyph_026.name: Executioner
