ParagonGlyph_027.name: Ire

ParagonGlyph_028.desc: After casting a {c_important}Shout{/c} skill, the active cooldown of every other {c_important}Shout{/c} is reduced by {c_number}[SF_0|1|]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_028.name: Marshal

ParagonGlyph_029.desc: Bleeding effects last {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} longer but deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
ParagonGlyph_029.name: Bloodfeeder

ParagonGlyph_030.desc: Skills that critically strike generate {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} Fury.
ParagonGlyph_030.name: Wrath

ParagonGlyph_031.desc: Hitting with a {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} skill reduces the active cooldown of another random {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} skill by {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_031.name: Weapon Master

ParagonGlyph_032.desc: Swapping weapons has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to cause the skill's damage to critically strike.
ParagonGlyph_032.name: Mortal Draw

ParagonGlyph_033.desc: Thorns damage increases all damage the target takes by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_033.name: Revenge

ParagonGlyph_034.desc: You take up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage the more {c_important}Fortified{/c} you are.
ParagonGlyph_034.name: Undaunted

ParagonGlyph_035.desc: When you {c_important}Overpower{/c} a target, all damage they take is increased by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[SF_1]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_035.name: Dominate

ParagonGlyph_036.desc: Bleeding damage has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage.
ParagonGlyph_036.name: Disembowel

ParagonGlyph_038.desc: You and your minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Physical damage.
ParagonGlyph_038.name: Corporeal

ParagonGlyph_039.desc: While in Werewolf or Werebear form, Close enemies take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_039.name: Fang and Claw

ParagonGlyph_040.desc: {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to crowd controlled or {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} targets.
ParagonGlyph_040.name: Earth and Sky

ParagonGlyph_041.desc: The passive portion of {c_important}Companion{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_041.name: Wilds

ParagonGlyph_042.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage while in Werebear form.
ParagonGlyph_042.name: Werebear

ParagonGlyph_043.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage while in Werewolf form.
ParagonGlyph_043.name: Werewolf

ParagonGlyph_044.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage while in Human form.
ParagonGlyph_044.name: Human

ParagonGlyph_045.desc: Poison damage over time effects have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to deal double the amount of damage over their duration.
ParagonGlyph_045.name: Bane

ParagonGlyph_046.desc: You and your minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Non-physical damage.
ParagonGlyph_046.name: Abyssal

ParagonGlyph_047.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Lightning damage to both {c_important}Healthy{/c} and {c_important}Injured{/c} targets.
ParagonGlyph_047.name: Fulminate

ParagonGlyph_048.desc: Poison damage over time effects last {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} longer.
ParagonGlyph_048.name: Tracker

ParagonGlyph_049.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Physical damage to Non-Elites and bosses.
ParagonGlyph_049.name: Outmatch

ParagonGlyph_050.desc: Critical strikes increase all the damage the target takes by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.
ParagonGlyph_050.name: Spirit

ParagonGlyph_051.desc: Shapeshifting has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to cause the skill's damage to critically strike.
ParagonGlyph_051.name: Shapeshifter

ParagonGlyph_052.desc: Non-Basic and Non-Core skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_052.name: Versatility

ParagonGlyph_053.desc: While wielding a melee weapon, you take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
ParagonGlyph_053.name: Closer

ParagonGlyph_054.desc: While wielding a ranged weapon, you take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
ParagonGlyph_054.name: Ranger

ParagonGlyph_055.desc: Physical damage increases all the damage the target takes by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_055.name: Chip

ParagonGlyph_057.desc: When you cast an {c_important}Agility{/c} skill, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Energy regeneration for {c_number}[{SF_1}]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_057.name: Fluidity

ParagonGlyph_058.desc: Casting an {c_important}Imbuement{/c} skill reduces the active cooldown of another random {c_important}Imbuement{/c} skill by {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_058.name: Infusion

ParagonGlyph_059.desc: When you hit a target with a Crowd Controlling effect, all the damage they take is increased by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_059.name: Devious

ParagonGlyph_061.desc: Skills that critically strike restore {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Energy cost.
ParagonGlyph_061.name: Combat

ParagonGlyph_062.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for every Close corpse.
ParagonGlyph_062.name: Gravekeeper

ParagonGlyph_063.desc: Non-physical damage increases all the non-physical damage the target takes by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_063.name: Canny

ParagonGlyph_066.desc: Critical strikes deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to targets that are not {c_important}Healthy{/c}.
ParagonGlyph_066.name: Essence

ParagonGlyph_067.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Physical damage to both {c_important}Healthy{/c} and {c_important}Injured{/c} targets.
ParagonGlyph_067.name: Pride

ParagonGlyph_068.desc: Targets affected by {c_important}Trap{/c} skills take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_068.name: Ambush

ParagonGlyph_069.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage while you have no active minions.
ParagonGlyph_069.name: Sacrificial

ParagonGlyph_070.desc: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([{SF_0} * PlayerHealthMax()]){/c}.
ParagonGlyph_070.name: Blood-drinker

ParagonGlyph_071.desc: Whenever your minions deal damage to a target, that target takes {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds.
ParagonGlyph_071.name: Deadraiser

ParagonGlyph_073.desc: Targets affected by {c_important}Curse{/c} skills take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_073.name: Amplify

ParagonGlyph_075.desc: Shadow damage over time effects have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage.
ParagonGlyph_075.name: Scourge

ParagonGlyph_076.desc: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced Physical damage from {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
ParagonGlyph_076.name: Diminish

Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion.flavor:
"The ancient scorpion Nine-Eyes is known as "The Terror of the Sands", and for good reason. Her massive tail can pierce the strongest armor, and her poison can melt flesh in seconds."
- Field Notes of an Unknown Iron Wolf
Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion.name: Broodmother's Stinger

Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.flavor: Even removed from the demon's body, the eye continues to weave its hypnotic patterns.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.name: Qin's Captivating Eye

Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.flavor: The handle of this white-hot mace bears soot marks in the shape of a clenched fist.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.name: Mace of Blazing Furor

Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.flavor:
"While the origins of this accursed blade are lost to time, there is no question that wielding its dark power leaves an indelible stain on one's soul." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.name: Darkblade

Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.flavor:
"So skilled was Abe-Mari at divination, they were able to perfectly predict the date of their own death.  The knowledge proved so disastrous that no mage since has attempted to re-create the feat."
- Excerpt from 'Secrets of the Mage-Clans'
Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.name: Wand of Abe-Mari

Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.flavor: This massive sword's edge grows keener with each life taken.
Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.name: Infernal Edge

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.flavor:
"Even after he was put to death, some children swore they could still hear his bell ringing softly in the breeze on moonless nights."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 5: "The Myth of Blind Edlin"
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.name: Blind Man's Bell

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.flavor: This vile necklace of charred goat's teeth paradoxically contains both the power to extend life as well as cut it short.
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.name: Necklace of Inevitability

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.flavor:
"A foul enchantment of desire was woven into the stone that shaped Enkil. Its idolaters were helpless as their souls were ripped from their bodies to animate its writhing form."
- Field Notes of Brother Darmont
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.name: Eye of Enkil

Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.flavor:
"The Captain was bleeding from at least three bite wounds, sweating from the poison and barely able to walk, but he never stopped searching for his lost comrades."
- Eulogy for Captain Willcocks
Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.name: Captain's Ragged Boots

Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.flavor:
"Favored by Pitiless Gur, this heavy armor remains painfully cold to the touch, even in the hottest of climates."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.name: Gur's Freezing Armor

Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.flavor:
"Those who came before shall bear witness to your deeds."
- Inscription on the hilt
Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.name: Haunted Crossbow

Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.flavor: Those foolish few Monks who abuse their training for personal gain are banished from the Floating Sky Monastery and forced to wander the harsh and unforgiving lands beyond.
Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.name: Outcast's Handwraps

Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.flavor:
"There is nothing better in life than to stand alone, painted red, atop a hill made from the bodies of your enemies."
- Zarozar the Mighty
Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.name: Bloodspiller's Helm

Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.flavor: Wearing these gore-drenched leggings fills your mind with a single overwhelming thought: to hunt.
Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.name: Manhunter's Breeches

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.flavor:
"Unhand me, filth! A single drop of my blood is worth an ocean of yours! Within it churns a power you could never hope to understand!"
- Lord EÃ²nan, last words
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.name: Blood-Cursed Band

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.flavor:
"Dearest Will, this ring is like my love for you. Both have no end. May this ring keep you safe and help keep me in your heart during your travels. - Lucya"
- Inscription on the band
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.name: Trembling Ring

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.flavor: Even the slightest touch leaves painful splinters in the flesh.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.name: Ring of Splintered Wood

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.flavor: A malformed collection of bone, flesh and a strange, hardened ichor, this ring-shaped object almost seems to have been grown, rather than crafted.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.name: Grotesque Loop

Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.flavor: A powerful relic once belonging to Jazreth the Summoner, this staff was thought lost forever.
Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.name: Staff of Elemental Command

1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Immobilize your target for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds when you Critically Strike.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Butcher's Cleaver

1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Your skills have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to also deal {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} for {c_number}3{/c} seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has re-appeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: Doombringer

1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Core{/c} Skills increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Whenever you stare at the reflection in this blade, you see a demonic figure standing behind you: vague and distorted, but always laughing.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.name: Oblivion

2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.desc: After a Crowd Control effect wears off from an enemy, they take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"Also known as The Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.name: Staff of Lam Esen

2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Increases your critical strike damage by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}. 

The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Grandfather

Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|~%|]{/c} bonus maximum resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} of Life you would have lost instead.
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe."
- Last words of Master Selig
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.name: Melted Heart of Selig

Boots_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Leaves a trail of frost that {c_important}Chills{/c} enemies. 
{c_important}Chilled{/c} enemies take {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more damage.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.name: Penitent Greaves

Chest_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after her death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.
Chest_Unique_Generic_100.name: Razorplate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Your attacks randomly deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life."
- Zurke
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.name: Fists of Fate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Freeze{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.name: Frostburn

Helm_Unique_Generic_001.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a poison nova that deals {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poison damage.
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.name: Andariel's Visage

Helm_Unique_Generic_002.desc:
Gain {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} damage reduction. 
In addition, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} to all skills.
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"This headdress was once worn by an assassin who disguised herself as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king and his entire lineage."
- The Fall of House Aston
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.name: Harlequin Crest

Ring_Unique_Generic_100.desc: If a {c_important}Core{/c} skill hits at least {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} or more enemies, {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the resource cost is refunded.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: The Cult of the Triune has been thought destroyed several times over the centuries. In reality, its members hide in temples across Sanctuary, awaiting the next great power that will promise them ascendancy.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.name: Signet of the Triune

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.desc: Your Maximum Life is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Your Blood Golem absorbs {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of damage you would take.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: While {c_important}Healthy{/c}, your Blood Golem gains {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction and {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You gain {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} increased Attack Speed, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Each time your Bone Golem takes up to {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} of its maximum Life as damage, it sheds a Corpse.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Bone Golem gains {c_number}[{SF_2}|%|]{/c} maximum Life and the amount of Thorns they inherit from you is increased from {c_number}[{SF_5}|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_3}+{SF_5}|%|]{/c}.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Every {c_number}5th{/c} Iron Golem attack causes a shockwave, dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_CONE_PAYLOAD}{/c} damage to the primary enemy and to enemies behind them.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Iron Golem's slam attack also makes enemies Vulnerable for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Each time your Cold Mages damage enemies with their primary attack, you gain {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Enemies who are Frozen by or damaged while Frozen by your Cold Mages' primary attack are made Vulnerable for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Your Overpower damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Reduce the Life cost of your Bone Mages' attacks from {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}. After being alive for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, Bone Mages deal {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Each time a Bone Mage dies from its own attack, they leave behind a Corpse and {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Base Life {c_number}({fortified:FORTIFY}){/c}.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Your maximum Essence is increased by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mage attacks have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every {c_number}{buffduration:STUN_COOLDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mages fire an additional shadow bolt every {c_number}{SF_0}th{/c} attack.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: You gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} non-Physical Resistance, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds your Skeletal Defenders negate the next instance of Direct Damage they would take.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Increase the amount of Thorns that Defender Warriors inherit from you from {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100}|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100}|%|]{/c}.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reaper attacks against enemies who are Immobilized, Slowed, Stunned, or Vulnerable reduce the cooldown of their powerful wind-up attack by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reapers have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to carve the flesh off enemies, forming a Corpse. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_CORPSE_COOLDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: You can raise one additional Skirmisher Warrior.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Each time you Critically Strike, your Skirmishers Warriors' next attack Critically Strikes. Can only happen every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade B

legendary_necro_002.desc: Each time one of your {c_important}Summoning{/c} Minions damages an enemy, they gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_002.name: of Frenzied Dead

legendary_necro_011.desc: When you pick up {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c}, a free {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
legendary_necro_011.name: of Possessed Blood

legendary_necro_012.desc: After hitting {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} enemy, {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_012.name: Splintering

legendary_necro_016.desc: Enemies take {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage from {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area for each second they are in it, up to {c_random}x[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_016.name: of Plunging Darkness

legendary_necro_017.desc: {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area, when spawned, Pulls in enemies around the affected area.
legendary_necro_017.name: of the Void

legendary_necro_020.desc: {c_important}Decompose{/c} can chain up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional targets. When {c_important}Decompose{/c} spawns a Corpse, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a Corpse under all afflicted targets.
legendary_necro_020.name: Rotting

legendary_necro_022.desc: Each target hit along {c_important}Sever's{/c} path increases the scythe's damage by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to {c_random}x[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_022.name: of Empowering Reaper

legendary_necro_023.desc: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your {c_important}Cold Skeletal Mages{/c} cast a blizzard that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage and continuously {c_important}Chills{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"/Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_023.name: Coldbringer's

legendary_necro_028.desc: {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage to its primary target per lanced target.
legendary_necro_028.name: Blood Seeker's

legendary_necro_029.desc: When {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} hits an enemy that is already lanced, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fire a {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} at a Nearby target.
legendary_necro_029.name: of Hungry Blood

legendary_necro_031.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Mages is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_necro_031.name: Viscous

legendary_necro_032.desc: {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves a trail that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} is active.
legendary_necro_032.name: of Bloodbath

legendary_necro_036.desc: {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_036.name: of Swelling Curse

legendary_necro_038.desc: When a segment of {c_important}Bone Prison{/c} is destroyed or expired, it deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage in an area around itself.
legendary_necro_038.name: of Bursting Bones

legendary_necro_041.desc: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage and with a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} larger radius per additional Corpse.
legendary_necro_041.name: of Corpse Boom

legendary_necro_053.desc: While {c_important}Army of the Dead{/c} is active, your Minions gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed and take {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
legendary_necro_053.name: Unyielding Commander's

legendary_necro_054.desc: Each time that {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} damages an enemy, gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} equal to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Base Life for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_054.name: of Shielding Storm

legendary_necro_066.desc: Enemies who are Stunned by {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are also made {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for its duration. If they die while Stunned, they have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.
legendary_necro_066.name: of Grasping Veins

legendary_necro_067.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_necro_067.name: Blood Getter's

legendary_necro_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills increase your Essence Regeneration by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Affix Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_100.name: of Torment

legendary_necro_101.desc: The {c_important}Ossified Essence{/c} Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills by {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per Essence above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_101.name: of Serration

legendary_necro_102.desc: {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} increases your Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} while active.
legendary_necro_102.name: Osseous Gale

legendary_necro_103.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence when hitting a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills.
legendary_necro_103.name: of Exposed Flesh

legendary_necro_104.desc: The {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Passive deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage against Slowed or Chilled enemies, and {c_random}x[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} increased damage against Stunned enemies instead.
legendary_necro_104.name: Blighted

legendary_necro_105.desc: Enemies afflicted by your {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to be Stunned for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second when they deal direct damage.
legendary_necro_105.name: Torturous

legendary_necro_106.desc: You deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage to enemies afflicted by both {c_important}Decrepify{/c} and {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.
legendary_necro_106.name: of the Damned

legendary_necro_107.desc: The {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Passive has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to form a Corpse each time it triggers.
legendary_necro_107.name: of Decay

legendary_necro_108.desc: {c_important}Blood Surge's{/c} nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
legendary_necro_108.name: Blood-bathed

legendary_necro_109.desc: {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} fires two additional waves, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage than the previous.
legendary_necro_109.name: Tidal

legendary_necro_110.desc: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} reduce your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_110.name: Fastblood

legendary_necro_111.desc: The {c_important}Rathma's Vigor{/c} Passive's bonuses persist for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds after you are no longer {c_important}Healthy{/c}.
legendary_necro_111.name: of Rathma's Chosen

legendary_necro_112.desc: While the {c_important}Rathma's Vigor{/c} Passive is active, you gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed.
legendary_necro_112.name: of Untimely Death

legendary_necro_113.desc: While at full Life, {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence.
legendary_necro_113.name: of Potent Blood

legendary_necro_114.desc: Each time your {c_important}Golem{/c} damages an enemy, its active Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_114.name: Hulking

legendary_necro_115.desc: The {c_important}Strength in Numbers{/c} Passive also grants your {c_important}Minions{/c} {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_necro_115.name: of Hardened Bones

legendary_necro_117.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} maximum Essence per active {c_important}Minion{/c}.
legendary_necro_117.name: Requiem

legendary_necro_118.desc: Your {c_important}Skeletons{/c} gain increased damage while alive, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} after {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_118.name: of Reanimation

legendary_necro_119.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_119.name: Cadaverous

legendary_necro_120.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.
legendary_necro_120.name: of the Embalmer

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_001.desc: You and your Minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion type you have active. This only applies to the Minion types: Skeletal Warrior, Skeletal Mage, and Golem.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_002.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your Minions have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to grant you a barrier for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your Max Life for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_003.desc: When your Minions die, they explode and deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Max Life as Shadow damage to nearby enemies.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_004.desc: Your Minions have {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less Max Life but deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_005.desc: Your Golem has {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased maximum Life and deals {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_006.desc: Consuming a corpse slows enemies around it by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds. Your {c_important}Corpse{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to crowd controlled enemies.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_007.desc: With at least {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} corpses Nearby, you take {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} less damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_008.desc: Consuming a corpse grants you {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_009.desc: When your Minion is killed, it has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to leave a corpse.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_010.desc: {c_important}Blood{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage but cost an additional {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|1%|]{/c} of the skill's Essence cost or Cooldown as a percent of  your maximum Life.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_011.desc: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} grant {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_012.desc: Blood Orbs also restore {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence when picked up.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_013.desc: {c_important}Bone{/c} skills grant you {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} damage reduction, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for the next {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_014.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Bone{/c} skills have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}2{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_015.desc: Whenever you consume a corpse, a Bone Spirit is spawned at its location.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_016.desc: You and your Minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to targets affected by Shadow damage over time effects.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_017.desc: Hitting enemies with {c_important}Bone{/c} skills increases your damage by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} and your maximum Essence by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds, stacks up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage and {c_number}[{SF_1}*{SF_2}]{/c} maximum Essence.

2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills {c_important}Chill{/c} enemies for up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}. 

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} additional Essence against {c_important}Frozen{/c} targets.
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"My companion swung her strange weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever."
- The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Bloodless Scream

Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.desc: {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} casts a mini nova on your {c_important}Minions{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per target drained by the initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker was most recently used as proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant

Boots_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Create desecrated ground beneath your {c_important}Sever{/c} spectres as they travel, damaging enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The massive stone door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen stout men to close, was thrown open wide. If I had known the horrors to come I would never have set foot inside that accursed place!"
- The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb

Chest_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
{c_important}Bone Storm{/c} and {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} are also {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills and deal Shadow damage. 

Enemies damaged by {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} take {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Blood Wave{/c} desecrates the ground it travels over, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds
Chest_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The dark wisps that crawl across this armor burrow into magic the way maggots might bore through putrid flesh.
Chest_Unique_Necro_100.name: Shadowclad Cuirass

Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Instead of detonating immediately, {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} summons a volatile undead that charges at a random enemy and explodes. {c_important}Corpse Explosion's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!"
- Ravings of Madman Gustav
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.name: Howl from Below

Helm_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Bone Spear leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage.
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Rathma is endless. He was the first of the Ancients, and only he will remain at the end. He is the true master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death eventually comes for him, why should he fear it?"
- Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathless Visage

Pants_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
{c_important}Blood Mist{/c} triggers {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} on surrounding Corpses. 
When {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Pants_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion these eldritch leggings."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Pants_Unique_Necro_100.name: Blood Artisan's Brais

Ring_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
While your {c_important}Minions{/c} are improved by the {c_important}Strength in Numbers{/c} Passive, you gain:

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to empower all of your {c_important}Minions{/c}, causing the next attack from each to explode for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The signet ring of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The power over life and death held within, however, has not dimished.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.name: Ring of Mendeln

legendary_rogue_003.desc:
{c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} also mimics the {c_important}Imbuements{/c} applied to your Skills. 
Casting an {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skill grants your {c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_003.name: of Imitated Imbuement

legendary_rogue_004.desc: Gain a {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds when standing still. Each {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow grants {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_rogue_004.name: Enshrouding

legendary_rogue_008.desc: Your {c_important}Rain of Arrows{/c} is always affected by all {c_important}Imbuements{/c} Skills at once.
legendary_rogue_008.name: of Sleeting Imbuements

legendary_rogue_010.desc: Whenever {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} damages an enemy, {c_number}2{/c} additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Penetrating Shot's{/c} base damage and do not split.
legendary_rogue_010.name: Trickshot

legendary_rogue_011.desc: {c_important}Flurry{/c} damages enemies in a circle around you and deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
legendary_rogue_011.name: of Encircling Blades

legendary_rogue_013.desc: When a {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow would be removed it explodes, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage around you.
legendary_rogue_013.name: of Volatile Shadows

legendary_rogue_014.desc: Damaging an {c_important}Injured{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill generates {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Energy.
legendary_rogue_014.name: Energizing

legendary_rogue_018.desc: When you {c_important}Evade{/c} or {c_important}Shadow Step{/c}, you leave behind a cluster of {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that explode and deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_018.name: of Surprise

legendary_rogue_019.desc: {c_important}Caltrops{/c} also throw a cluster of {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that explode and deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_019.name: Trickster's

legendary_rogue_020.desc: Casting a Skill that is {c_important}Imbued{/c} creates an explosion around you, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage of the same type.
legendary_rogue_020.name: of Unstable Imbuements

legendary_rogue_021.desc: {c_important}Twisting Blades{/c} cause an explosion when they return to you, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage and {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*0.5/5]{/c} additional damage based on the distance the blades travel, up to {c_number}5{/c} meters and {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*1.5]{/c} total damage.
legendary_rogue_021.name: of Volatile Blades

legendary_rogue_023.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a Poisoned enemy has up to a {c_number}50%{/c} chance to create a toxic explosion that applies {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poison damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to the target and surrounding enemies.
legendary_rogue_023.name: Venomous

legendary_rogue_024.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a Close enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release an explosion that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, {c_important}Chilling{/c} them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_024.name: of Chilling Presence

legendary_rogue_026.desc: When you cast {c_important}Dash{/c}, a Shadow Clone is spawned at your location that also casts {c_important}Dash{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the base damage.
legendary_rogue_026.name: Shadowslicer

legendary_rogue_028.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Ranged{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} chance to create an arrow storm at the target's present location, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. You can have up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} active arrow storms.
legendary_rogue_028.name: of Arrow Storms

legendary_rogue_100.desc: {c_important}Barrage's{/c} arrows have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to split into {c_number}2{/c} arrows whenever they ricochet.
legendary_rogue_100.name: of Branching Volleys

legendary_rogue_101.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to enemies affected by your {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to make them {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_101.name: Blast-Trapper's

legendary_rogue_102.desc:
Your {c_important}Grenades{/c} Skills count as {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills. 
Whenever you arm a {c_important}Trap{/c} or drop {c_important}Grenades{/c}, you gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_102.name: of Explosive Verve

legendary_rogue_103.desc: Whenever you trigger a Lucky Hit, gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds, up to a maximum of {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_103.name: of Uncanny Resilience

legendary_rogue_104.desc: Explosions from the {c_important}Victimize{/c} Passive Heal you for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life for each enemy damaged, up to a maximum of {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Life.
legendary_rogue_104.name: of Cruel Sustenance

legendary_rogue_105.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Making an enemy {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_105.name: Vengeful

legendary_rogue_106.desc: Killing a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy grants you {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Energy Regeneration for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_106.name: Ravenous

legendary_rogue_107.desc: Upon taking damage from surrounding enemies, drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} and gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. This effect can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_107.name: Escape Artist's

legendary_rogue_108.desc: Each stack of {c_important}Momentum{/c} grants you {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Thorns.
legendary_rogue_108.name: Barbed

legendary_rogue_109.desc: When you break {c_important}Concealment{/c}, you drop a cluster of {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} around your location that explode, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_109.name: Opportunist's

legendary_rogue_110.desc: You automatically drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} at the end of {c_important}Dash{/c}. {c_important}Dash's{/c} cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds for each enemy {c_important}Dazed{/c} this way, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_110.name: of Quickening Fog

legendary_rogue_111.desc: You take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} less damage from Crowd Controlled enemies. Whenever a Crowd Controlled enemy deals direct damage to you, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_111.name: Cheat's

legendary_rogue_112.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_112.name: of Siphoned Protection

legendary_rogue_113.desc: Your {c_important}Imbuements{/c} Skill effects have {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased potency against {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
legendary_rogue_113.name: of Corruption

legendary_rogue_114.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_114.name: Mangler's

legendary_rogue_115.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Ranged{/c} or {c_important}Melee{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics your attack.
legendary_rogue_115.name: of Ruthless Mimicry

legendary_rogue_116.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes with {c_important}Ranged{/c} Skills have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_116.name: Draining

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_001.desc: After taking Poison, Cold, or Shadow damage, the target takes {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less damage from you from that type, and {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} more damage from the other two types for the next {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_002.desc: Your Imbues apply to {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} additional attack.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_003.desc: While any of your Imbues are on cooldown, your Imbue-able attacks have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to gain one of those Imbue effects.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_004.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to Distant enemies but deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} decreased damage to Close enemies.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_005.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to Close enemies but deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} decreased damage to Distant enemies.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_006.desc:
Your {c_important}Ranged{/c} skills grant your next {c_important}Melee{/c} skill {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Your {c_important}Melee{/c} skills grant your next {c_important}Ranged{/c} skill {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_007.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for each Nearby target that is Crowd Controlled, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100 * {SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_008.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage to targets affected by your {c_important}Trap{/c} skills.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_009.desc: When {c_important}Inner Sight's{/c} gauge becomes full, you gain {c_number}+[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Dodge Chance for {c_number}[{SF_1|1|}]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_010.desc: Whenever you deal damage to a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy, they take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage from you for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_011.desc: Your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage and grant you {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds when cast.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_012.desc: Skills that consume {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Combo Points deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_013.desc: For each Close enemy, your Dodge Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_014.desc: When you kill a Poisoned enemy, they leave a pool of poison on the ground that deals {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of that enemy's Max Life as poison damage over {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_015.desc: For each enemy that is Chilled in the area, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_016.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to enemies affected by Shadow Imbuement's debuff.

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage per {c_important}Combo Point{/c} spent. However, your {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills using this weapon have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_number}0{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers."
- Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Condemnation

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.desc: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1 * 100|1%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%|]{/c}.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.name: Asheara's Khanjar

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If you had maximum {c_important}Precision{/c} stacks when you cast the Skill, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Energy{/c}, this can only happen once per cast.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"Genai took up her bow and, drawing back the string, aimed at the sun itself. The sun burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night.
- Fable of "The Great Sky-Hunt"
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Skyhunter

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hits with this weapon have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage and Knock Back the target.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.flavor:
"There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.name: Windforce

2HCrossbow_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to ricochet to another target.
2HCrossbow_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may be forced to suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not." 
- Proclamation of Hakan II
2HCrossbow_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Word of Hakan

Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: You gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." 
- Excerpt from a burned parchment
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Cowl of the Nameless

Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.desc: {c_important}Death Trap{/c} {c_important}Freezes{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, but deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its base damage.
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.flavor:
"From that day forth, he knew whenever he felt that strange cold breeze on the nape of his neck that Ashen Jack was somewhere very close by, watching and waiting."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "A Cold Wind Blows"
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.name: Chill of Night

Pants_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage for each stack of Momentum you have, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} damage.
Pants_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Pants_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Temerity

Sorcerer_Enchantment_ArcLash.desc: Whenever you are hit, there is a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance the attacker is Stunned for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} second.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_BallLightning.desc: When {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} would form, there's a {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} chance Ball Lightning is formed instead.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Blizzard.desc: Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds, a Blizzard forms over you and follows you for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_ChainLightning.desc: Chain Lightning forms automatically after spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Mana.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_ChargedBolt.desc: Whenever you are hit, there is a {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} chance to release {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Charged Bolts.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FireBall.desc: When you kill an enemy, they explode in a Fireball for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of its damage.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Firebolt.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your direct damage has up to a {c_number}{SF_4}%{/c} chance to Burn enemies for {c_number}{dot:BURNING}{/c} over {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Firewall.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Direct damage has up to a {c_number}{SF_2}%{/c} chance to spawn a Firewall for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FlameShield.desc: Flame Shield automatically activates when you take fatal damage. It takes {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds to recharge.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FrostNova.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to make your active {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skills unleash a Frost Nova.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Frostbolt.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your direct damage has up to a {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} chance to {c_important}Chill{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c}.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FrozenOrb.desc: Whenever you cast a non-{c_important}Basic{/c} Skill, you have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Hydra.desc: When a Burning enemy is killed, a Hydra head spawns from its corpse for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_IceArmor.desc: Upon getting hit, you have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to apply Ice Armor.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_IceBlades.desc: Killing an enemy has a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to conjure Ice Blades.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_IceShards.desc: Ice Shards automatically conjure and fly towards {c_important}Frozen{/c} enemies.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Incinerate.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Direct damage has up to a {c_number}{SF_5}%{/c} chance to spawn a rotating Incinerate beam.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_LightningSpear.desc: Absorbing {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to conjure a Lightning Spear.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Meteor.desc: Every time an enemy takes Burning damage, there's a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance a Meteor falls on them.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Spark.desc: Killing an enemy has a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to form a {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c}.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport.desc: {c_important}Evade{/c} is replaced with Teleport on a {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} second cooldown.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport_Active.desc: {c_red}Teleport description here - since this is a skill that replaces your Evade button, you should never see this.{/c}
Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport_Active.name: Teleport - Evade Version

legendary_sorc_004.desc: {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} lets you move unhindered through enemies. Enemies you move through while {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} is active are Immobilized for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_004.name: of Binding Embers

legendary_sorc_006.desc: While within your own {c_important}Blizzard{/c}, you take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
legendary_sorc_006.name: Snowguard's

legendary_sorc_008.desc: {c_important}Meteor{/c_important} deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c_number} increased Critical Strike Damage against {c_important}Healthy{/c} targets.
legendary_sorc_008.name: of Three Curses

legendary_sorc_012.desc: {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} gains {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} extra projectiles, but its Mana cost is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_012.name: of Overwhelming Bolts

legendary_sorc_017.desc: {c_important}Frost Nova{/c_important} gains an additional Charge but the Cooldown per Charge is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_017.name: Frostblitz

legendary_sorc_027.desc: Collecting {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} increases your Movement Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_027.name: Charged

legendary_sorc_035.desc: {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} stays in place after reaching its destination and explodes {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional times for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage.
legendary_sorc_035.name: of Frozen Orbit

legendary_sorc_037.desc: {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} pierce, but deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
legendary_sorc_037.name: Rolling Thunder

legendary_sorc_039.desc: You may have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional {c_important}Hydra{/c} active, but {c_important}Hydra's{/c} Mana cost is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_039.name: Hydra Master's

legendary_sorc_043.desc:
{c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around you during {c_important}Inferno{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage on impact. 
Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} {c_important}Immobilize{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_043.name: of Armageddon

legendary_sorc_100.desc: While Channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, your Burning damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_100.name: of Conflagration

legendary_sorc_101.desc: {c_important}Esu's Ferocity{/c} no longer grants a Burning Damage bonus, but its Direct Damage bonus is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_101.name: of Ancient Flame

legendary_sorc_102.desc: Burning Damage has a {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased chance to trigger Lucky Hits.
legendary_sorc_102.name: of Blazing Fortune

legendary_sorc_103.desc: Killing a Burning enemy grants {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Mana Cost reduction for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_103.name: Incendiary

legendary_sorc_104.desc: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times you deal Direct Fire Damage to an enemy, they are Immobilized for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_104.name: of Seared Flesh

legendary_sorc_105.desc: Coming in contact with your {c_important}Firewall{/c} grants you {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_105.name: Flamewalker's

legendary_sorc_106.desc:
{c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around {c_important}Meteor{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage on impact. 
Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} additionally Burn enemies they hit for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_106.name: of Shattered Stars

legendary_sorc_107.desc: When you cast {c_important}Blizzard{/c} it will periodically spawn exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Frozen{/c} enemies.
legendary_sorc_107.name: Glacial

legendary_sorc_108.desc: Casting {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} makes you {c_important}Unstoppable{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_108.name: Snowveiled

legendary_sorc_109.desc: While {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} is active, you leave behind exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} {c_important}Chill{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_109.name: of the Frozen Wake

legendary_sorc_110.desc: {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} pierce {c_random}[ceil(1/(Affix_Value_1/100))-1]{/c} times, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage per subsequent enemy hit.
legendary_sorc_110.name: of Piercing Cold

legendary_sorc_111.desc: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, you restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life and Mana.
legendary_sorc_111.name: Encased

legendary_sorc_112.desc: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} while you have a Barrier active.
legendary_sorc_112.name: of Frozen Fortune

legendary_sorc_113.desc: When you {c_important}Freeze{/c} an enemy there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance they become {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_113.name: of Biting Cold

legendary_sorc_114.desc: Enemies that die while {c_important}Frozen{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to unleash a {c_important}Frost Nova{/c}.
legendary_sorc_114.name: Frozen Torrent

legendary_sorc_115.desc: You deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies while you have a {c_important}Barrier{/c}.
legendary_sorc_115.name: Storm Swell

legendary_sorc_116.desc: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} form in the area, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%|]{/c} increased explosion radius.
legendary_sorc_116.name: of the Frozen Tundra

legendary_sorc_117.desc: While {c_important}Unstable Currents{/c} is active, your passive Mana Regeneration is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_117.name: of Volatile Currents

legendary_sorc_118.desc: Each time {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} bounces off you, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Mana.
legendary_sorc_118.name: Recharging

legendary_sorc_119.desc: {c_important}Ball Lightning{/c} travels back to you after reaching the end of its path, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
legendary_sorc_119.name: of Static Cling

legendary_sorc_120.desc: Critical Strikes to Close enemies increase {c_important}Vyr's Mastery's{/c} bonuses by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_120.name: Mage-Lord's

legendary_sorc_121.desc: {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn an additional {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} when you cast it.
legendary_sorc_121.name: of Splintering Energy

legendary_sorc_122.desc: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to chain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional times.
legendary_sorc_122.name: of the Unbroken Tether

legendary_sorc_123.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after {c_important}Teleporting{/c}.
legendary_sorc_123.name: of the Bounding Conduit

legendary_sorc_124.desc: After being active for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, {c_important}Lightning{/c} Skill casts during {c_important}Unstable Currents{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger an additional {c_important}Lightning{/c} Skill.
legendary_sorc_124.name: Stabilizing

legendary_sorc_126.desc: Taking direct damage has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skills.
legendary_sorc_126.name: of the Unwavering

legendary_sorc_127.desc: {c_important}Core{/c} or {c_important}Mastery{/c} Skills cast at or above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Mana gain a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
legendary_sorc_127.name: Elementalist's

legendary_sorc_128.desc: Your passive Mana Regeneration is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} if you have not taken damage in the last {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_128.name: of Concentration

legendary_sorc_129.desc: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or {c_important}Frozen{/c} enemies.
legendary_sorc_129.name: of Control

legendary_sorc_130.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Movement Speed bonus.
legendary_sorc_130.name: Deft Magus'

legendary_sorc_131.desc: You take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage from Crowd Controlled or {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
legendary_sorc_131.name: Everliving

legendary_sorc_132.desc: Casting a {c_important}Basic{/c} skill reduces the Mana cost of your next {c_important}Core{/c} skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_132.name: of Efficiency

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_001.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage while {c_number}[{SF_1}]{/c} or more burning enemies are Nearby.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_002.desc: Direct damage from {c_important}Pyromancy{/c} skills burns the target for an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of its base damage over {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_003.desc: Burning enemies you kill explode, dealing {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Max Life to enemies nearby.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_004.desc: Your Elemental attacks deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased critical strike damage against Frozen targets.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_005.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Chilled{/c} and {c_important}Frozen{/c} targets.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_006.desc: Enemies become {c_important}Chilled{/c} for {c_number}[SF_1|%|]{/c} after they unfreeze from your {c_important}Freeze{/c} effects. You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less damage from {c_important}Chilled{/c} targets.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_007.desc: Critical Strikes from {c_important}Shock{/c} skills grant you {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage for {c_number}5{/c} seconds. This effect stacks up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_008.desc: Dealing damage with {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to not consume a charge.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_009.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Shock{/c} skills have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to release {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} lightning sparks that each deal {c_number}{payload:SPARK}{/c} damage.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_010.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to targets that are both Burning and Chilled.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_011.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Core{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to make your next {c_important}Mastery{/c} skill deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_012.desc: After using an Elemental skill, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Resistance against that element for {c_number}4{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_013.desc: Nearby enemies take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Elemental damage. You and nearby allies gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} Elemental Resistance.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_014.desc: While moving, you regenerate Mana {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} faster. While standing still, you gain {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased Fire, Cold, and Lightning damage every second, up to {c_number}x[{SF_1}*{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_015.desc: After spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Mana, you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_1]){/c} as {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_016.desc: While you have a barrier, you take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less damage and gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased movement speed.

1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: While Channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Flamescar

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} launches {c_number}3{/c} projectiles that deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor:
"Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." 
- Josiah
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Staff of Endless Rage

Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Collecting {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} while full releases a lightning nova, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage to enemies around you.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo

Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: After using {c_important}Teleport{/c}, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds, but {c_important}Teleport's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_number}x[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: The power you have is never enough.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Raiment of the Infinite

Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to re-ignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: The Cathedral of Light.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Gloves of the Illuminator

Gloves_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Free casts from the {c_important}Icefall{/c} Passive gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"While scholars have since proven these gloves were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down in an unbroken line since the formation of the Mage Clans." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esu's Heirloom

Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Explosions from the {c_important}Shatter{/c} Passive deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage if enemies die while {c_important}Frozen{/c}.
Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked on the ring, but refused to stay the hammer for even a moment.
Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Iceheart Band

Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.desc: {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to chain to an additional enemy.
Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.flavor:
"Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough." 
- Esu, to an unknown Sorcerer
Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.name: Ring of Starless Skies
